data.title: Academics
data.meta_description: Academics news from the Emory News Center
data.text:
Emory University offers academic degrees and programs through nine schools:

Emory College of Arts and Sciences

Oxford College

James T. Laney School of Graduate Studies

Goizueta Business School

School of Law

School of Medicine

Nell Hodgson Woodruff School of Nursing

Rollins School of Public Health

Candler School of Theology

Emory's library system comprises the Robert W. Woodruff Library and several specialty libraries.
